Sladki žgani požirki
Sadni, zeliščni, kremni ali kavni liker nas bo pogrel po zimskem sprehodu; če ga vlijemo v lične stekleničke, ga lahko tudi podarimo.
07 Nov 2019, 10:14 by Alenka Kociper



GETTY IMAGES/ISTOCKPHOTOKremni likerji temeljijo na mlečnih izdelkih.



GETTY IMAGES/ISTOCKPHOTOIzbrano sadje spasiramo, zmešamo s sladkorjem in zalijemo s poljubno žgano pijačo.



GETTY IMAGES/ISTOCKPHOTOZeliščne so nekoč uporabljali kot zdravilo. FOTOGRAFIJE: Guliver/Getty Images


V prihajajočih hladnih dneh se bodo prilegle tople ali vroče pijače, čaji pa na primer topla limonada, vroča čokolada, med alkoholnimi kuhano vino. Pogrejejo tudi žgane pijače, ki si jih seveda privoščimo v manjših količinah, kot moja priletna soseda, ki sicer alkohola ne uživa, ko jo na zimskem sprehodu pošteno zazebe v noge in roke, pa ob prihodu domov vselej zvrne šilce krepkega. Za zdravje, pravi, in pri svojih dobrih osemdesetih res ni nikoli bolna, niti prehlajena ni. Iz žganih pijač, kot so žganje, konjak, viski ali vodka, lahko doma pripravimo imenitne likerje najrazličnejših okusov, ki jih bomo ponudili (premraženim) gostom. Seveda lahko kupimo industrijsko pripravljene, a bodo boljši, če jih pripravimo sami, po svojem okusu. Uporabni so tudi v kulinariki, saj z njimi popestrimo različne jedi, tudi sladice.


Izbrano sadje spasiramo, zmešamo s sladkorjem in zalijemo s poljubno žgano pijačo.GETTY IMAGES/ISTOCKPHOTO

Liker je sladka alkoholna pijača, ki vsebuje od 15 do 40 odstotkov alkohola, to je več kot vino in malo manj kot žganje ali viski, ki ga vsebujeta praviloma nad 40 odstotkov. Priprava domačega likerja je enostavna, potrebujemo žgano pijačo in sestavine, ki jih bomo namočili vanjo, da izboljšamo njen okus. Likerje delimo predvsem na sadne, zeliščne in kremne, posebna skupina pa so kavni, ki so v primerjavi z drugimi bolj grenki. Temeljna sestavina za kremne likerje, poleg žganja seveda, so mlečni izdelki (smetana, mleko ali kondenzirano mleko), zeliščne pa pripravimo tako, da v žganje namočimo zelišča in dodamo sladkor, za najpreprostejšega kavnega pa zmešamo sladkor, instant kavo in sladkor ter dolijemo žganje. Sadni likerji dopuščajo obilico različic, izbrano sadje spasiramo, zmešamo s sladkorjem in zalijemo s poljubno žgano pijačo. Po določenem času, praviloma po nekaj tednih, jo precedimo.Večina likerjev mora stati nekaj nekaj tednov, da dobijo pravi okus in aromo, zato je zdaj pravi čas, da jih začnemo pripravljati, če hočemo, da bodo nared do božično-novoletnih zabav, seveda pa so primerni tudi za darilo. Ne glede na to, ali jih bomo hranili v domači shrambi ali jih bomo podarili, jih natočimo v lične stekleničke, saj je pri postrežbi tako finih pijač pomemben tudi videz. K temu spadajo tudi primerni kozarci, najlepši so kelihi na tankih pecljih.

Sweet Spirits
Fruit, herb, cream or coffee liqueur will keep us warm after a winter stroll; if it is poured into personal bottles, it can also be donated.
07 Nov 2019, 10:14 by Alenka Kociper



GETTY IMAGES / ISTOCKPHOTOCream liqueurs are based on dairy products.



GETTY IMAGES / ISTOCKPHOTOSave selected fruit, mix it with sugar and pour it with any spirits.



GETTY IMAGES / ISTOCKPHOTOHerbs were once used as medicine. PHOTOS: Gulliver / Getty Images


Hot or hot drinks will fit in the coming cold days, with teas such as warm lemonade, hot chocolate, while alcohol is brewed. Spirits are also heated, which of course we can afford in smaller quantities than my approachable neighbor, who does not consume alcohol, but when he walks in the legs and arms in the winter walk, always throws spikes of boldness upon arrival. For health, she says, and in her good eighties, she's really never sick or cold. Spirits such as brandy, cognac, whiskey or vodka can be used to prepare delicious liqueurs of a wide variety of flavors at home to serve (frosted) guests. Of course, we can buy industrially prepared ones, but they will be better prepared if we make them ourselves. They are also useful in cuisine, because they are varied with various dishes, including desserts.


Save the selected fruit, mix it with sugar and pour it with any spirits.GETTY IMAGES / ISTOCKPHOTO

A liqueur is a sweet alcoholic beverage containing 15 to 40 percent alcohol, which is more than wine and a little less than brandy or whiskey, which generally contains more than 40 percent. Preparing homemade liqueur is easy, we need a spirits and ingredients that will be soaked in it to improve its taste. The liqueurs are mainly divided into fruit, herbs and cream, and a special group is coffee, which is more bitter than other. The basic ingredient for cream liqueurs, besides brandy, of course, is dairy products (cream, milk or condensed milk), and herbal preparations are made by soaking the herbs and adding sugar, and for the simplest coffee, mix sugar, instant coffee and sugar and add brandy. . Fruit liqueurs tolerate an abundance of variants, save the selected fruit, mix it with sugar and pour it with any spirits. After some time, usually after a few weeks, we sift it. Most liqueurs have to wait a few weeks to get the right taste and aroma, so now is a good time to start preparing them if they want to be done before the Christmas and New Year's parties, but of course they are also suitable for the gift. Whether stored in the home pantry or donated, we put them in personal bottles, as serving such fine drinks is also important. These include suitable glasses, the most beautiful are the glasses on thin stalks.
